column5: There is a Safeway in Kenora as well. PjShorthorn
This is also the one we've stopped at several times. Good grocery store with a big selection.

When in the area, we always stop at the store on the highway in Emo. It is just to the right when entering town from FF. They have a large selection of everything and their large bread selection is fresh. In addition, the adult beverage store is also on the right, just before you get to the grocery store. Bill
Thanks John that is what I needed to find out about the Co-Op Store Larry S
Not that much more expensive.They have the killer walleye crumbs there to Larry.You should try some.
Cloverleaf in Emo. On your right side as you come into town.
There is also Gill's Trading Post on 71 in Sioux Narrows. https://gillstradingpost.com
You'll go right by Dalseg's in Nestor Falls and they have beer there as well.

Need to Know Supermarkets/Food Stores on Hwy 71 between Ft Francis and Kenora. Just Got a Call asking if we could Fly-In on Friday due to heavy Fly-In traffic on Saturday. We will be able to do it and need a Supermarket/Food Store between Ft Francis & Kenora to shop This is great because the early Fly-In gives my Sister & me and Extra Day to Fish Larry S
Larry, I always shop at the Safeway in Fort Francis. It's on FF's main street to the east and maybe a mile or so out of your way.
That’s an awesome deal you got and hopefully they don’t get you until the next Saturday
Could stop in Vermilion Bay Larry.The coop store will have everything you need.Then your only 1/2 hour from Clarks
there is a decent size grocery store called dalseg's in nester falls with a cafe next door with good breakfast, not quit as big as safeway..
Agreed, it's a nice store and plenty of parking for those pulling a boat.
